Apple, Inc. | Cupertino, CA

Apple’s Siri is looking for exceptional engineers, designers, and project managers well versed in machine learning, natural language, speech recognition, server automation, and/or mobile software development. Siri is used on countless iOS and watchOS devices and handles over a billion requests per week. Siri also tells jokes about math.

If you’re passionate about music, home automation, or one of a variety of open positions you’ll be right at home.

Apply online or send a resume and a feature request to brittanyd@apple.com.
